page.title: 20A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: A typical day for me,Mark,aged 11, is to get up about 7.00am and make ready for school. I make my breakfast and then get changed. I go and see dad in the milking parlour and talk to him. When dad has finished milking I take the cows and put them into a field for him and then carry on to school. At school we have two playtimes and at 12 noon we have dinner. The dinners are nice. My school teacher is called Mr Falshaw. I do not like school. I would rather help dad at home. School finishes at 3.30pm. I bike to and from school. When I get home I get changed and have tea. After tea I help dad to do some jobs on the farm. We have supper about six o'clock. I have a last look around the animals before going to bed at nine o'clock.
